entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Single-file publishing should be deterministic #60041
  • Test failure: Assert failure: Verify_TypeLayout 'System.Numerics.Vector`1' failed to verify type layout #60036
    7.0.0
  • Setting COMPlus_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 causes System.PlatformNotSupportedException with optimized libraries code #60035
  • SSL_CERT_DIR/SSL_CERT_FILE with move over to Apple's libraries #60030
    Future
  • [JIT][arm64] CSE for VSD calls #60025
    7.0.0
  • [JIT][arm64] double dmb #60023
    7.0.0
  • [JIT][arm64] recognize Interlocked.Increment in volatile increment #60021
    7.0.0
  • Enable custom converter tests in src-gen mode #60020
    7.0.0
  • profiler.elt work item test failures in slowpatheltenter #60018
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendPacketsAsync.SendPacketsElement_FileZeroCount_Success sometimes fails #60017
  • Make crossgen trimmable #60016
    7.0.0
  • Can't download .NET 5 SDK 5.0.401 x86 binaries #60011
  • Update Microsoft.Signed.WiX to 1.0.0-v3.14.0.5722 #60003
    6.0.0
  • On Linux, FileShare.None doesn't seem to be taken into account when retrying to open a locked file #59995
    6.0.0
  • SSL/TLS handshake fails in Ubuntu 20.04 and Net 5.0 using mysql server #59986
  • Can't authorize in asp.net server with kerberos (401) #59983
  • Significant double percision calculation/storing/parsing issue #59982
  • Regressions in System.Drawing.Tests.Perf_Color #59999
  • Regressions in System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests.Perf_Encoders #59997
  • DisableCertificateDownloads & AIA behaviour #59979

Closed

  • Interop+AppleCrypto+AppleCFErrorCryptographicException: The operation couldn’t be completed. (Internal CSSM error error -2147416032 - Internal error #80010820 at SignTransform_block_invoke... #59703
    Future
  • Regression in Span<Byte>.SequenceCompareTo #59706
    6.0.0
  • Regression in Single/Double parsing #58027
    6.0.0
  • Symbol and NetHosts Archives no longer produced #49026
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.BinaryReadAndWriteTests #60001
  • Can't read full text of .pdf file #59998
  • Add WhereNotNull to help with nullability tracking #30381
    Future
  • .Net 5: For Thai, IndexOf(string) returns wrong index for some strings #59120
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Block out the test Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericTest on arm64 pending investigation #60039
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a Reverse P/Invoke scenario for profiler transition tests. #60038
    increase-code-coverage, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Updated channel passed to ci_setup in the performance-setup.sh file. #60034
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete KeyValuePairConverter #60031
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debug compilation using cmake #60029
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Enable interop tests #60028
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add PreciseRefCountsRequierd method #60027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Remove the runtime-specific `Stream` source files. #60019
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use custom error message when running out of syncblocks #60013
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/6.0] Update signed wix version for arm64 fixes #60008
    packaging, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 5.0.12 #60007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix byte array handling in STJ sourcegen #60004
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add R2RTest support for the perfmap-format-version Crossgen2 option #60002
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable providervalidation runtime test on MonoVM. #59994
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Add ISMETHOD and ISMETHODHASH macros #59993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix benign assert in gtNewTempAssign #59991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59990
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #59989
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix libcoreclr.so build incompatibilities on Linux #59988
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Correctly Save GC Mode on Suspension on Windows for SampleProfiler #59974
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Rollback changes breaking rolling builds #60040
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1403459 #60000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • Pin compiler version to workaround package validation loading missmatching roslyn versions #60026
  • Syndication test fixes for wasm. #59835
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication, 7.0.0
  • Update CODEOWNERS to remove JSON area and to add Obsoletions #60032
    area-Meta
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic (#59450) #59757
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update area-owners to reflect a few changes #59975
    area-Meta
  • Code review feedback for DacHeapWalker #60014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add back the nethost archive. #59847
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Remove use of Unsafe in regex source generator #60005
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • FileStream.Unix: improve DeleteOnClose when FileShare.None. #55327
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep (#59106) #59960
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] do not enforce windows end of line with lint #60010
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fixes based on feedback for the original #59929 #59967
    area-Host
  • Seal internal types in runtime libs #59941
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Update CompatibilitySuppressions files after upgrading Package Validation logic #59955
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ignore nop-statements between tailcall and ret #59980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix byte array handling in STJ sourcegen #59957
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Crossgen for FreeBSD, now that it is actually implemented. #59853
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59968
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Cleanup XPath.StringToDouble #55867
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Seal internal types in runtime tasks #59935
    area-Meta
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix a macro usage and cleanup stale comment #59907
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] missing lint fixes #59969
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Dllimport generator build and test fixes #59658
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: better support for patchpoints in try regions #59784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some of the issues around pgo data collection of stack trace data #59970
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59869
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Build improvements based on feedback #59671
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve regex reductions and code gen for some alternations #59903
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Process cancelled tasks from SerialStream.Unix read/write request queues when a timeout occurs #55188
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, needs more info, needs author feedback, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, needs author feedback, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs author feedback, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixes #38162 #56860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit in BigInteger #59951
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Regex source generator to use new GetBestTypeByMetadataName method #59778
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Implement coreclr_create_delegate and move ComponentActivator to shared CoreLib #59962
    area-Interop-mono
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • Make bounds check nodes ordinary binary opers #59963
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Validate CompressionLevel in BrotliStream ctor #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Make AOT compiler work with VS 2022 #1618

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] SignalR MessagePackHubProtocol #1625

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge upstream runtime main into feature/s390x #1629

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add support for returning ref types (in ShadowStack spill slot) #1627
  • Fix and update replace for NonBackTracking #1616
  • Fix Regex match test and clean up RegexHelpers #1628
  • FreeBSD build #1607
  • Add VS2022 detection #1624
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failure in `dotnet add package` prints weird help message #21770
  • Support rolling back workload manifests even if Visual Studio installed workloads #21766
    6.0.2xx
  • MSBuildSdkResolver sometimes uses 32-bit SDK paths in VS 2022 #21765
  • Support grouping multiple workload packs in a single MSI #21741
    6.0.2xx

Closed

  • Dotnet CLI does not work properly in VS 22 Terminal? #19251
    6.0.1xx
  • Given manifest layout ManifestReader should read out localized description #20922
    6.0.1xx
  • msdeploy vs zipdeploy #21666

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1404918 #21782
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime. #21748

Merged

  • Update branding for 5.0.403 #21759
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 5.0.209 #21758
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 3.1.121 #21756
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 3.1.415 #21757
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport to Main `Add support for localized component names msbuild property` #21663
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Closed

Updated

    9.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extract method fails on top-level programs #56969
  • Allow pattern matching to satisfy type parameter constraints #56965
  • SemanticModel exposes nothing to indicate if a delegate type was inferred implicitly. #56963
    17.1
  • IOp api indicates conversion operation where none should exist. #56953
  • CS1729 code fix does not respect naming convention for records #56952

Closed

  • Possibility to conditionally deactivate CS8509 (not exhaustive switch) #56936
  • Static Abstract Interface Member issue related to Inheritance and Generic Constraints #56753
    17.1
  • Deprecate the `-unsafe` compiler switch #56632
  • How to properly use nullable analysis attributes for a method that validates an object properties #56800
  • Target-typed new expression does not work with params method signature when invoked with a single argument #56880
  • How to generate deterministic builds in C# without build environment influence. #56904
  • Not correctly represent Attribute Data for Attributes from another assembly #56933
  • VBCSCompiler eagerly depends on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.dll (when when no VB compiled) #56945
  • Message IDE0051 when there shouldn't be #56960
  • Lambda expressions with attributes are formatted incorrectly #56543
    17.1
  • Maybe a bug: Inner InvalidProgramException when dealing with `dynamic` and .ToList() #56372
    17.1
  • CSharpMatchFolderAndNamespaceDiagnosticAnalyzer / IDE0130 gives false positive on files in project root #56958
  • Codelens doesn't display information on source-generated code #50252
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update warning text and parameter #56968
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, 17.1
  • Simplify implementation of Inline-Temporary #56964
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Allow fixing valid unused variables nested inside bad local declarations #56955
    Area-IDE
  • BoundUsingLocalDeclarations/BoundUsingStatement - don't store Conversion in the node. #56954
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't throw adding references to a project with a missing reference #56951
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1395758 #56877
    auto-merge
  • Update PublishData.json #56970
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56967
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56966
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #56943
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Create DiagnosticSuppressorDesign.md #56944
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Fix formatting of attributes on lambdas #56639
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56948
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update support for finding CodeLens references from source generated files #53043
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add external access for vscode telemetry #56894
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56971
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • List patterns: add more tests and fix nullability analysis #53822
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Annotate completion providers #56937
    Area-IDE
  • Add SolutionSessionId and ProjectsWithAppliedChanges telemetry properties #56947
    Area-Interactive, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Tighten enforcement of naming convention for local functions #56680
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • String splitter refactoring #56889
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable roll-forward to newer SDK versions #56950
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't break if we fork a snapshot after freezing partial semantics #56890
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor JS interop: Provide a way to better control the JSON.stringify() process #37312
  • HTTP/3: Consider adding libmsquic to mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet #37311
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] Bundling all resources into a single file #37310
  • Startup regression: multiple_queries #37300
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, mvc #37299
  • DefaultHealthCheckService should use CreateAsyncScope() #37296
  • Blazor issue with generics ? #37295
  • Document pattern for prerendering head section #37293
    6.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.Signed.WiX to 1.0.0-v3.14.0.5722 #37290
  • Modify controller action code, click hot reload, ViewBag properties become inaccessible #37288
  • ReactRedux project template npm install EJSONPARSE failure #37287
  • Rename EndpointMiddleware to EndpointExecutionMiddleware #37284
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent bool to string conversion #37283
  • Suggestion: Use Razor template engine outside of MVC #37282
  • Drawn controls support for Blazor #37281
    Backlog
  • Webserver tries to serve /_framework5.0.xx.js and throws exception in a loop #37278
  • Startup regression: fortunes, json #37276

Closed

  • WebApplication does not react to appsettings.json changes #37046
    6.0.0
  • [Bug] Memory stream is closed inside WebApplicationBuilder and MauiAppBuilder while configuring the host configuration. #37030
    6.0.0
  • HTTP/3 end-to-end signoff for .NET 6 #35531
    6.0.0
  • Reading form with invalid content throws NullReferenceException #36987
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Kestrel] Using Expect: 100-continue header in a request doesn't produce expected results #37126
  • Accepting HTTP Requests In Worker Service #37195
  • HeadOutlet not working when using WebAssembly and Serverside Pre Render. #37254
  • Startup improvement: caching, json #36975
  • [Blazor] TypeError: Failed to Fetch in Android Chrome Incognito Mode #37286
  • Blazor wasm: unable to reference enums in razor page and namespace not visible #37218
  • can you add a new component to body/div in Blazor ? #37253
  • Using FromRouteAttribute's Name property with minimal routes is broken #37268
    6.0.0
  • VS 2022 : Compiler detection errors #37277
  • Single file build time regression: json #37211
  • Perf regression: json_nodejs, plaintext_nodejs #37210
  • Razor Component: 2 comments in a row, crashes VS2019 #15160
  • Blazor Component called "Script" produces intellisense errors and fails to compile correctly #24159
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio warning about razor component closing tag #18685
    Razor.Tooling
  • Blazor using high CPU running background tasks that never finish #20731
    Razor.Tooling
  • Blazor page error takes much longer time to show up #12845
    Backlog
  • Razor expression statement completion disappears when typing quickly in Visual Studio #9137
    Backlog
  • MissingManifestResourceException forces you to Stop running. #9065
    Backlog
  • Respect `EndpointGroupName` attributes in MVC ApiExplorer #35055
    Backlog
  • Namespace names are always grayed out in _ViewImports.cshtml #5009
    Razor.Tooling
  • TagHelper Insert Text Doesn't Work Appropriately When Re-Querying Completion #22261
    Razor.Tooling
  • rename enum ignores cshtml files #20732
    Razor.Tooling
  • FindFirstValue(ClaimTypes.Email) returns null #34937
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.1 to 1.5.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/signalr #37313
    area-signalr, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript
  • Unquarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works #37309
    area-mvc
  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution
  • Merge bootstrap4 sxs support from release/6.0 #37294
    area-identity
  • [release/6.0] Set aria-current for manage pages #37274
    Servicing-approved, area-identity

Merged

  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37039
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Don't allow modifying WebRootPath after initialization #37147
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.0
  • Fix form key accumulator #37272
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Clear layout directories before copies #37208
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/6.0] Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37040
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • Update build.gradle #36478
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • Revert "[release/5.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36564
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36758
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36894
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Use new Hosted build pools #37162
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Don't clear NuGet caches at all #37163
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Clear layout directories before copies #37165
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37175
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • Update branding for 3.1.21 #37291
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37176
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37161
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36895
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36891
